meanings.sent1: The event was attended by many nonartists who appreciated the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The museum welcomed a group of nonartists on a guided tour.
meanings.sent3: The nonartists tried their hand at painting and had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: In a world of creativity, nonartists are like stars in daylight.
meanings.sent5: The nonartists stood out in the crowd with their unique perspectives.

meanings.definition: Those who do not possess artistic skills or abilities.
meanings.sent1: The art class was open to nonartists looking to explore their creativity.
meanings.sent2: Nonartists often admire the work of skilled painters and sculptors.
meanings.sent3: The nonartists attempted pottery but ended up with lopsided bowls.
meanings.sent4: Among the artists, the nonartists were like fish out of water.
meanings.sent5: The gallery showcased pieces created by both artists and nonartists alike.
